PlatformToken","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"renounceOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"usdcToken","outputs":[{"internalType":"contract IERC20","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"platformTokenAmount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdrawUSDC","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"MagRelo","custom:security":"This contract uses OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard and Ownable for security","details":"Manages USDC deposits, CUT token minting/burning, and yield generation through Compound V3  This contract implements a simplified token system where: - Users deposit USDC and receive CUT tokens in a 1:1 ratio - USDC is automatically supplied to Compound V3 for yield generation - If Compound V3 is paused or deposit fails, USDC is stored directly in the contract - Users can withdraw their original deposit amount (1:1 ratio) - All yield generated stays in the contract for platform use  Key Features: - 1:1 USDC to CUT token conversion - Automatic Compound V3 integration for yield generation - Fallback to direct USDC storage if Compound is unavailable - Yield retention by platform (no user distribution) - Emergency withdrawal capabilities - Compound V3 pause state handling with graceful fallback ","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"BalanceSupply(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of excess USDC withdrawn","owner":"The address of the contract owner","recipient":"The address receiving the excess USDC","timestamp":"The timestamp of the withdrawal"}},"CompoundDepositFallback(address,uint256,string)":{"params":{"reason":"The reason for the fallback (e.g., \"Compound supply failed\")","usdcAmount":"The amount of USDC stored directly in contract","user":"The address of the user making the deposit"}},"EmergencyWithdrawal(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The total amount withdrawn","owner":"The address of the contract owner","recipient":"The address receiving the funds","timestamp":"The timestamp of the withdrawal"}},"USDCDeposited(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"platformTokensMinted":"The amount of CUT tokens minted","usdcAmount":"The amount of USDC deposited","user":"The address of the user making the deposit"}},"USDCWithdrawn(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"platformTokensBurned":"The amount of CUT tokens burned","usdcAmount":"The amount of USDC withdrawn","user":"The address of the user making the withdrawal"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"balanceSupply(address)":{"details":"Only callable by the contract owner","params":{"to":"The address to receive the excess USDC  This function calculates the excess USDC (yield) that can be withdrawn while maintaining sufficient backing for all minted CUT tokens.  Requirements: - Caller must be the contract owner - to must not be the zero address - There must be excess USDC available (yield generated)  Emits a {BalanceSupply} event"}},"constructor":{"details":"Sets the deployer as the owner and validates all contract addresses","params":{"_cUSDC":"The address of the Compound V3 Comet contract  Requirements: - All contract addresses must not be zero addresses","_platformToken":"The address of the CUT platform token contract","_usdcToken":"The address of the USDC token contract"}},"depositUSDC(uint256)":{"details":"Automatically supplies USDC to Compound V3 for yield generation Falls back to storing USDC directly in contract if Compound deposit fails","params":{"amount":"The amount of USDC to deposit  Requirements: - amount must be greater than 0 - User must have approved sufficient USDC allowance  Emits a {USDCDeposited} event Emits a {CompoundDepositFallback} event if Compound deposit fails"}},"emergencyWithdrawAll(address)":{"details":"Only callable by the contract owner in emergency situations","params":{"to":"The address to receive all USDC  This function withdraws all USDC from both the contract and Compound V3, regardless of token supply backing. Use only in emergency situations.  Requirements: - Caller must be the contract owner - to must not be the zero address - There must be funds available to withdraw  Emits an {EmergencyWithdrawal} event"}},"getCompoundUSDCBalance()":{"returns":{"_0":"The USDC balance in Compound V3 (6 decimals)"}},"getTokenManagerUSDCBalance()":{"returns":{"_0":"The USDC balance in the contract (6 decimals)"}},"getTotalAvailableBalance()":{"returns":{"_0":"The total USDC balance available (6 decimals)"}},"isCompoundSupplyPaused()":{"returns":{"_0":"True if Compound supply is paused, false otherwise"}},"isCompoundWithdrawPaused()":{"returns":{"_0":"True if Compound withdraw is paused, false otherwise"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"withdrawUSDC(uint256)":{"details":"Withdraws from Compound V3 if necessary to fulfill the withdrawal Falls back to contract USDC if Compound is paused and sufficient funds are available","params":{"platformTokenAmount":"The amount of CUT tokens to burn  Requirements: - platformTokenAmount must be greater than 0 - User must have sufficient CUT token balance - Either Compound V3 withdraw is not paused OR sufficient USDC is available in contract  Emits a {USDCWithdrawn} event"}}},"title":"DepositManager","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"BalanceSupply(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the owner withdraws excess USDC (yield)"},"CompoundDepositFallback(address,uint256,string)":{"notice":"Emitted when Compound deposit fails and USDC is stored directly in contract"},"EmergencyWithdrawal(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the owner performs an emergency withdrawal of all funds"},"USDCDeposited(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a user deposits USDC and receives CUT tokens"},"USDCWithdrawn(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a user withdraws USDC by burning CUT tokens"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"balanceSupply(address)":{"notice":"Withdraws excess USDC (yield) while ensuring token supply remains backed"},"cUSDC()":{"notice":"The Compound V3 Comet contract for yield generation"},"constructor":{"notice":"Constructor initializes the DepositManager with required contract addresses"},"depositUSDC(uint256)":{"notice":"Deposits USDC Compound V3)"},"isCompoundSupplyPaused()":{"notice":"Gets the Compound V3 supply pause status"},"isCompoundWithdrawPaused()":{"notice":"Gets the Compound V3 withdraw pause status"},"platformToken()":{"notice":"The CUT platform token contract"},"usdcToken()":{"notice":"The USDC token contract"},"withdrawUSDC(uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraws USDC by burning the specified ense":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://399594cd8bb0143bc9e55e0f1d071d0d8c850a394fb7a319d50edd55d9ed822b","dweb:/ipfs/QmbPZzgtT6LEm9CMqWfagQFwETbV1ztpECBB1DtQHrKiRz"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x41f6b3b9e030561e7896dbef372b499cc8d418a80c3884a4d65a68f2fdc7493a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://80b0992a11b2fd1f75ced2971696d07bbd1d19ce6761dd50d8b6d48aa435f42a","dweb:/ipfs/QmZDe5xd2gXHjVEjv9t8C1KQ68K5T8qFwdinwQgmP3rF3x"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe06a3f08a987af6ad2e1c1e774405d4fe08f1694b67517438b467cecf0da0ef7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://df6f0c459663c9858b6cba2cda1d14a7d05a985bed6d2de72bd8e78c25ee79db","dweb:/ipfs/QmeTTxZ7qVk9rjEv2R4CpCwdf8UMCcRqDNMvzNxHc3Fnn9"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20Metadata.sol":{"keccak256":"0x70f2f713b13b7ce4610bcd0ac9fec0f3cc43693b043abcb8dc40a42a726eb330","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c13d13304ac79a83ab1c30168967d19e2203342ebbd6a9bbce4db7550522dcbf","dweb:/ipfs/QmeN5jKMN2vw5bhacr6tkg78afbTTZUeaacNHqjWt4Ew1r"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x982c5cb790ab941d1e04f807120a71709d4c313ba0bfc16006447ffbd27fbbd5","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8150ceb4ac947e8a442b2a9c017e01e880b2be2dd958f1fa9bc405f4c5a86508","dweb:/ipfs/QmbcBmFX66AY6Kbhnd5gx7zpkgqnUafo43XnmayAM7zVdB"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x11a5a79827df29e915a12740caf62fe21ebe27c08c9ae3e09abe9ee3ba3866d3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3cf0c69ab827e3251db9ee6a50647d62c90ba580a4d7bbff21f2bea39e7b2f4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmZiKwtKU1SBX4RGfQtY7PZfiapbbu6SZ9vizGQD9UHjRA"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x79796192ec90263f21b464d5bc90b777a525971d3de8232be80d9c4f9fb353b8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f6fda447a62815e8064f47eff0dd1cf58d9207ad69b5d32280f8d7ed1d1e4621","dweb:/ipfs/QmfDRc7pxfaXB2Dh9np5Uf29Na3pQ7tafRS684wd3GLjVL"]},"src/DepositManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x963d3ee1e4cc9a5f16545b95a8d9f6dccc9b39b232cf9035f886ae99149380f7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4143c228f52035523b624c2a8bebde0f57c87cf528457b035a95c18c2175467a","dweb:/ipfs/QmaBaqGVDzsuGSU6x52MqgSv83h6rE9d3XPwyuCTWx2ndN"]},"src/PlatformToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0x988edd866f2bf88e8dda82327e7a84edd0f35b519e38b70946e877796c0245f4","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b23e96bd80c7ada2a7e4f6e03df613f0608b22b34bffcc42365d5587dab43506","dweb:/ipfs/QmQubwhdXi2MjZxt2jgJHM376W9ke2oXPLXDZCPx7U5s2r"]}},"version":1}

balanceSupply(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params.to: The address to receive the excess USDC  This function calculates the excess USDC (yield) that can be withdrawn while maintaining sufficient backing for all minted CUT tokens.  Requirements: - Caller must be the contract owner - to must not be the zero address - There must be excess USDC available (yield generated)  Emits a {BalanceSupply} event

constructor.details: Sets the deployer as the owner and validates all contract addresses

params._cUSDC: The address of the Compound V3 Comet contract  Requirements: - All contract addresses must not be zero addresses
params._platformToken: The address of the CUT platform token contract
params._usdcToken: The address of the USDC token contract

depositUSDC(uint256).details: Automatically supplies USDC to Compound V3 for yield generation Falls back to storing USDC directly in contract if Compound deposit fails

params.amount: The amount of USDC to deposit  Requirements: - amount must be greater than 0 - User must have approved sufficient USDC allowance  Emits a {USDCDeposited} event Emits a {CompoundDepositFallback} event if Compound deposit fails

emergencyWithdrawAll(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner in emergency situations

params.to: The address to receive all USDC  This function withdraws all USDC from both the contract and Compound V3, regardless of token supply backing. Use only in emergency situations.  Requirements: - Caller must be the contract owner - to must not be the zero address - There must be funds available to withdraw  Emits an {EmergencyWithdrawal} event

returns._0: The USDC balance in Compound V3 (6 decimals)
The USDC balance in the contract (6 decimals)
The total USDC balance available (6 decimals)
True if Compound supply is paused, false otherwise
True if Compound withdraw is paused, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawUSDC(uint256).details: Withdraws from Compound V3 if necessary to fulfill the withdrawal Falls back to contract USDC if Compound is paused and sufficient funds are available

params.platformTokenAmount: The amount of CUT tokens to burn  Requirements: - platformTokenAmount must be greater than 0 - User must have sufficient CUT token balance - Either Compound V3 withdraw is not paused OR sufficient USDC is available in contract  Emits a {USDCWithdrawn} event

balanceSupply(address).notice: Withdraws excess USDC (yield) while ensuring token supply remains backed

cUSDC().notice: The Compound V3 Comet contract for yield generation

constructor.notice: Constructor initializes the DepositManager with required contract addresses

depositUSDC(uint256).notice: Deposits USDC and mints CUT tokens in a 1:1 ratio

emergencyWithdrawAll(address).notice: Emergency withdrawal of all available USDC

getCompoundUSDCBalance().notice: Gets the USDC balance supplied to Compound V3

getTokenManagerUSDCBalance().notice: Gets the USDC balance held directly by this contract

getTotalAvailableBalance().notice: Gets the total available USDC balance (contract + Compound V3)

isCompoundSupplyPaused().notice: Gets the Compound V3 supply pause status

isCompoundWithdrawPaused().notice: Gets the Compound V3 withdraw pause status

withdrawUSDC(uint256).notice: Withdraws USDC by burning the specified amount of CUT tokens
